system.description: You can cast disguise self once per long rest. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast blindness/deafness (blindness only) once per long rest. At 5th level, you can cast nondetection once per long rest. You donâ€™t need material components for these spells, and when casting them your spellcasting ability is Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma (whichever is highest).
